basics.name: KAREN MARY LOBO
basics.summary: Results-driven Team Lead and Full-Stack Developer with 7+ years of experience building scalable Angular applications and leading high-performing development teams. Expertise in modern web technologies, Agile methodologies, and technical mentorship.

experience.title: Team Lead
bullets: Led and mentored cross-functional developer team with focus on technical excellence and career growth
Conducted comprehensive code reviews to maintain coding standards and product quality
Coordinated sprint planning, analysis, and stakeholder requirement discussions
Managed task allocation, progress tracking, and delivery timelines across multiple projects
Facilitated daily stand-ups and periodic project status reviews with leadership
Developed onboarding programs for new team members
Partnered with QA team for defect analysis and resolution

experience.title: Software Developer – UI/UX
bullets: Designed and maintained Angular applications for financial services platform
Built responsive user interfaces with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Integrated RESTful APIs and managed JSON-based data workflows

experience.title: Junior Developer – UI/UX
bullets: Developed UI components for Angular 8 applications
Identified and resolved critical UI/UX issues and bugs

experience.title: Assistant Developer
bullets: Analyzed requirements and produced technical documentation
Built responsive layouts using HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap framework
Collaborated with clients to design and deploy landing pages

education.degree: Master of Science in Information Technology
education.school: Parvatibai Chowgule College Of Arts & Science — Goa, India
Rosary College of Commerce and Arts — Goa, India

recognition.title: Software Developer of the Quarter
recognition.detail: Recognized for outstanding performance and leadership excellence
